item.title: Google Search Could Change Forever in the UK
item.description: New regulation from the UK’s competition authority means Google may be forced to make major changes in the way that people use its search engine.

item.title: The Best Vacuum for Pet Hair—We Tested a Dozen Models to Find Which Work Best (2025)
item.description: Cordless, handheld, robot, and traditional—we tested them all to find the vacuum that’s fantastic for fur.

item.title: 5 Best Folding Phones (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Ready to move on from the traditional glass slab? Introduce a hinge into your life with these folding smartphones.

item.title: 10 Best Smartwatches (2025): Apple, Wear OS, Hybrid & Kids’ Watches
item.description: These WIRED-tested wearables reduce your reliance on a phone while keeping you connected.

item.title: Proton VPN Review (2025): The Best VPN for Most People
item.description: Proton VPN has a low price, an excellent privacy track record, and blistering speeds. What more could you ask for?
